Package Controller

Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
Controller.FileManager
public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class manages the reading and writing of data to the text files.

      public static void write​(java.lang.String fileName, java.util.List data) throws java.io.IOException
      This method takes in the file name and data to be written and writes to the file
      Parameters:
      fileName - This is the file name of the file that we want to write to
      data - This is the data that is written to the file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error, IOException will be thrown
